DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test hypothesis disruption `` normal '' ( three meal day ) eat pattern prolong overnight fasting cause skip breakfast : ) alters expression specific clock gene clock gene target involve regulate adipose tissue lipolysis ( breakdown destruction ) ; ii ) increase basal adipose tissue lipolytic ( breakdown ) activity plasma free fatty acid ( FFA ) concentration ; iii ) reduce skeletal muscle insulin sensitivity ; iv ) increase daylong plasma glucose , FFA , insulin concentration . The investigator study healthy , lean person either randomized consume either 3 standard meal per day omit breakfast consume 2 meal per day without change daily calorie intake ( skip breakfast group ) .
DOC.criteria: Males & female 1855 year old BMI 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 Sleeps 7 > hours/night Normally consume 3 meals/day , include breakfast Pregnancy , lactate breastfeed Diabetes Sleep disorder Significant organ dysfunction Shift nighttime worker Smokers Breakfast skipper People regularly sleep less 7 hours/night Consume excess amount alcohol Medications could alter result study
